title: Vlog It!
description:
So many of you have shared with me....so finally my chance to share back!

couldnt find this software anywhere on torrents, so had to buy it!

This was created by Serious Magic, who were bought by Adobe recently.

You may know some of their other products which have now become
Adobe Visual Communicator, Adobe Ultra and Adobe OnLocation respectively.

This product hasn&#039;t yet been &#039;adobe-fied&#039;, and it doesnt look like they&#039;re going to (its basically a lighter version of visual communicator and has most features, but for a fraction of the cost - and an even bigger fraction to you! mwa ha ha!)

This is a really cool, really easy to use video creation app.  its best for vlogs (video logs), or you-tube videos you want to do, etc. It produces very high quality results, very easily, and with the built in teleprompter and such easy to add newsroom style features, you can turn your drab vlog into something that will engage even the most impatient you-tuber!

So - Welcome to Vlog It! (below copied from Adobe site) 

HOPE YOU ENJOY!!!

The Magpie




OVERVIEW

Vlog It creates video blogs faster and easier than traditional video editing software because there&#039;s no editing! In fact, it&#039;s more like an automatic TV newsroom right inside your computer.


Create your video blog

Drag and drop photos, video clips or music into Vlog It. You get plenty of customizable graphics, effects, titles, music and templates to complement your video blog. Use them to express yourself in fun and exciting ways.

Narrate your video blog

When using the teleprompter, you can quickly add narration to digital images and video clips you acquire from your digital camera, camcorder or cell phone. This handy tool ensures you speak clearly and confidently without memorizing lines and can be paused at any time for the ultimate form of self-expression - the tangent.

Step in front of the camera

Position a webcam or camcorder directly above your computer monitor for the ultimate in video blogging - the personal newscast. When you read your script from the teleprompter, it looks as if you&#039;re staring into the camera. After you press record, all your news-style graphics, titles, images, and videos will show up automatically as you talk.


Share your video blog

After recording your video blog, click Publish to automatically create a FlashÃ‚Â® video viewable by virtually every computer on earth. All the techie details like video compression, file transfer and thumbnail creation are handled behind the scenes by Vlog It. You just drag and drop the video thumbnail icon into your blog edit screen. When readers click on the thumbnail your vlog will play automatically. *



REASONS TO BUY (edit by me - ok, not buy, download! :D)

Automate the video creation process

Create a video blog quickly with the Automated Wizard. Choose to create a video based on a particular look or style, such as Contemporary, Financial or High Tech.
Narrate your videos

Narrate you video blog using the teleprompter to sound professional and eliminate the need to memorize lines. Easily adjust the speed of the teleprompter to adapt to different reading styles. Pause the teleprompter to elaborate on a topic without breaking your focus.
Replace your background

Place a one-color backdrop (such as green fabric) behind you to digitally replace the background with any image or video clip.
Record daily video blogs 

Create template-based video blogs that remember the format of the last video created so you can quickly record daily blog postings.
Update commonly-used videos without rendering

Shoot segments out of sequence or at different times. Start in the middle, begin at the end, or update any section of your video blog at any time without re-recording the entire video.
Change video content quickly

Replace audio, images or video while you&#039;re actually recording.
View your video before recording

All clips and recordings play back in frame-accurate, real-time preview.
See your edits in real-time

Scroll through your production easily while seeing all special effects, images and video recordings immediately.
Drop media directly into Vlog It!

Drag-and-drop graphics, audio, video, and photos from your computer, cell phone or video camera into the Action Tray to customize your video blog.
Create special titling effects

Generate title styles for opening/closing slates and lower third graphics. Lower third titles are transparent in the top two thirds of the image and can be superimposed over video blogs, still images or graphics to look like a newscast.
Create fun or dramatic scene changes

Customizable transitions make video blogs flow easily from one scene, image or video to another. You get over-the-shoulder graphic transitions too.

As long as users have a simple webcam, and preferably a separate microphone, they should be able to get up and running quickly, creating their own video logs in no time flat."
